battle_traits.name: Pledges to the Dark Gods
battle_traits.effect:
Each time a friendly Snow Peaks unit uses 1 of the following abilities, gain 1 oath point.

• ‘Oath of Bloodshed’
• ‘Oath of Murder’
• ‘Oath of Supremacy’
• ‘Oath of the Marauder’
• ‘Oath of the Raider’
• ‘Oath of Conquest’

Designer’s Note: The abilities listed above are abilities on Darkoath warscrolls. By using those abilities (i.e. completing the oaths), the player gains oath points, which can then be spent to use the Oath abilities in these Army of Renown rules.

battle_traits.name: Speed of the Blood Crow
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Phase (Army), Your Charge Phase
battle_traits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly Snow Peaks unit that has not used an Oath ability this turn to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Spend 1 oath point. For the rest of the turn, the target can use Charge abilities even if it used a Run ability in the same turn.

battle_traits.name: Hunger of Shesh'shan
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Phase (Army), Your Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly Snow Peaks unit that has not used an Oath ability this turn to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Spend 1 oath point. For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

battle_traits.name: Rage of Arkhar
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Phase (Army), Your Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly Snow Peaks unit that has not used an Oath ability this turn to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Spend 2 oath points. The target can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, the target has Strike‑last for the rest of the turn.

battle_traits.name: Daemonfire Weapons
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Phase (Army), Your Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly Snow Peaks unit that has not used an Oath ability this turn to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Spend 1 oath point. For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

battle_traits.name: Messengers of the Gods
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Phase (Army), End of Any Turn
battle_traits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly Snow Peaks Darkoath Marauders or Fellriders unit that has been destroyed and has not used an Oath ability this turn to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Spend 2 oath points. Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield, wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 3" from all enemy units.

battle_traits.name: Shroud of the Pale Elk
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Phase (Army), Reaction: Opponent declared an Attack ability
battle_traits.effect: If that friendly Snow Peaks unit has not used an Oath ability this turn, spend 1 oath point. For the rest of the turn, that friendly unit has Ward (4+).

heroic_traits.name: Oath of Kinship
heroic_traits.effect: While this unit is within the combat range of another friendly Snow Peaks unit, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s attacks.

artefacts_of_power.name: Grand Offering
artefacts_of_power.activation: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Movement Phase
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick a friendly Snow Peaks Wilderfiend within 9" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Give the target D6 sacrifice points.

abilities.name: Infernal Sorcery
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 3 or more power points, pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Wizard within 3" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove 3 power points from this terrain feature, then add 1 to casting rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Corrupt The Realms
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 9 or more power points, pick an objective or terrain feature within 24" of this terrain feature to be the source. Then, pick any number of enemy units within 3" of the source to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Remove 9 power points from this terrain feature, then roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Draw Power
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Give a number of power points to this terrain feature equal to the roll. This terrain feature can have a maximum of 12 power points at once.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Chieftain

abilities.name: Tribal Warleader
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Darkoath Infantry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Oath of Murder
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy Hero or Monster this turn, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as an Oathsworn.

warscrolls.name: Singri Brand

abilities.name: Swift As The Wind
abilities.effect: Only critical hits score successful hits for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Uncanny Shot
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s Singri’s Warbow for attacks that target enemy units that are within 6" of a friendly Gunnar Brand.

warscrolls.notes: This unit can only be taken in Gunnar Brand’s regiment.

abilities.name: Carve a Path To Glory
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if it is in combat with an enemy Hero.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has Strike-last for the rest of the turn. This unit can only use the second Fight ability if it is in combat with an enemy Hero, and if it does so, it must pick an enemy Hero to be the target of all of its attacks.

abilities.name: Oath of Bloodshed
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if any enemy Heroes were slain by this unit’s combat attacks this turn.
abilities.effect: Friendly Gunnar’s Oathsworn units have Ward (4+) for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Oath of the Marauder
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase and the unmodified charge roll was 8+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s weapons for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Glorious Death
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly Darkoath Heroes, each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Cavalry Warleader
abilities.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for friendly Darkoath Cavalry units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Oath of Murder
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy Hero or Monster this turn, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Oath of the Raider
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase and is only in combat with 1 enemy unit, and that enemy unit is only in combat with this unit, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s weapons for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Swift Attackers
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Feed on Flesh
abilities.effect: Each time a model (friendly or enemy) is slain within 12" of this unit, give this unit a sacrifice point, to a maximum of 6. If there are more than 1 friendly Darkoath Wilderfiend units within 12" of the slain model, only 1 of them can be given a sacrifice point for that slain model.

abilities.name: Primal Sorcery
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

Mind Shroud: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of sacrifice points this unit has. If any of the rolls are a 5+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

Warping Balefire: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of sacrifice points this unit has. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

Dark Might: Heal (X) this unit, where X is the number of sacrifice points this unit has.

After applying the effect you picked, reset this unit’s sacrifice points to 0.

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

warscrolls.name: The Oathsworn Kin

abilities.name: Broken Nadja
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Broken Nadja is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1).

abilities.name: Withering Death
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy Hero within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target and subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.notes: This unit can only be taken in Gunnar Brand’s regiment. This unit cannot be reinforced.

abilities.name: Ruin-blessed Conqueror
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an objective that this unit is contesting.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, other friendly Darkoath units have Ward (5+) while they are contesting that objective.

abilities.name: Oath of Supremacy
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is wholly within enemy territory and charged this phase, for the rest of the battle, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Darkoath units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Oath of Conquest
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is contesting an objective you control that is wholly within enemy territory, this unit has Ward (5+) for the rest of the battle.
